0: Fascinating people watching at the pool that is for sure
We visited with small kids and the hotel is right on the beach and has a great pool for the kids to enjoy too
The pool service including the bar staff and pool staf worked as a unified team
The bar aka Living Room and pool area were welcome respites after a long day of walking around
The offer of a hospitality suite to freshen up following our pool time was very welcome
Bed was comfortable Pool was great clean warm lots of towels complimentary water and apples
Beautiful roof top pool with lovely view
A gem in Ft Lauderdale especially the pool
The pool is kid friendly and adult friendly with a full bar
1: The 2nd pool is very secluded and was nice but on the opposite side of the hotel
We have stayed at other local luxury hotels and found their pool area more where we spend most of our time on vacations
The Pool area was beautiful but I hear it is currently under construction which is a shame as I wanted to stay there again this fall
My view of the front pool that is undergoing a renovation looked liked the apocalypse
2: Logan of construction pool was not as nice as expected
It was one floor above the pool area where a DJ was playing live music at full volume

we were AROUND all day that last day at the pool cafe restaurants giving THEM business instead of taking it elsewhere and was it was OKAY charging hundreds of dollars on dinner but locking us out for 150 incidentals issue and then not unlocking the room until after 2 am and hours of sitting in the hallway waiting by the door
Food service by the pool in Fort Lauderdale was minimal
Relaxing pool to ourselves strange showers
I get off at 5 and if I had to travel back to the hotel I could not enjoy the evening with a drink by the pool
Pool furniture at the small pool that is in total disrepair
The pool looking over A1A in the ocean was over the top
Later on in the day we went to hang out by the pool
